concept.title: Personas
concept.shortdesc: Eucalyptus comes with three default personas. This section explains what they are and what privileges they have.

section.title: Cloud Super Admin
section.p: The Cloud Super Admin (CSA) is the super user, and can perform any privileged operation in Eucalyptus. The CSA can also delegate these privileges. The CSA is the only user who can create, modify, and delete privileged policies. The CSA is also the only user who can assign these policies to users.

section.title: Cloud Resource Admin
section.p: The Cloud Resource Admin (CRA) can manage AWS-defined resources (such as S3 objects, instances, users, etc) across accounts

section.title: Infrastructure Admin
section.p: The Infrastructre Admin (IA) can perform operations related to system setup and management. Typical responibilities include:

ul.li: installation and configuration (prepare environment, install Eucalyptus, configure Eucalyptus)
monitoring and maintenance (infrastructure supporting the cloud, cloud management layer, upgrades, security patches, diagnostics and troubleshooting)
